programme.title: Inseparable Bros
programme.desc: Though not biologically related, two disabled men form a sibling-like relationship after spending 20 years together.

programme.title: I Don'T Fire Myself
programme.desc: Being discriminated as a woman, Jeong-eun was dispatched and given great pressure to resign, but she is not willing to simply give up...

programme.title: In Our Prime
programme.desc: Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the China–North Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: The Negotiation
programme.desc: An arms dealer kidnapped two Koreans in Bangkok where the hostages were in fact held in an abandoned children's home in South Korea, when the kidnapper's motivations becomes clearer.

programme.title: Deranged
programme.desc: A pharmaceutical salesman races against time to save his family when they start to exhibit symptoms of a fatal outbreak that had been causing an epidemic of drownings.

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: Innocent Witness
programme.desc: A housekeeper is charged with murder. Her attorney is surprised to learn the only witness to the crime is a teenage girl with Asperger's. Will the girl be able to provide a valid statement?

programme.title: I Don'T Fire Myself
programme.desc: Being discriminated as a woman, Jeong-eun was dispatched and given great pressure to resign, but she is not willing to simply give up...

programme.title: The Odd Family: Zombie On Sale
programme.desc: When a pharmaceutical company's illegal experiments inadvertently create a zombie, the quirky Park family discovers an interesting side effect to the virus and tries to profit from it.

programme.title: Boomerang Family

programme.title: Feng Shui
programme.desc: A fengshui expert, Park Jae-Sang, who can determine the land that bring good fortune and people around him compete to occupy the land in order to change their fate and become king.

programme.title: The Tower

programme.title: The Thieves
programme.desc: Korean and Hong Kong thieves team up to heist a $20M worth diamond, while everyone has their own agenda to keep the diamond for themselves.

programme.title: Ashfall

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep893894
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45384539
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1776
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3534
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45394540
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1981

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3535
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep897898

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1983
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) Ep373
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This movie is inspired by the true story of real-life hero Huo Yuan Jia. When a fight destroys the reputation of this renowned martial arts champion along with the lives of his family, Huo’s path to redemption brings him face-to-face with the most ferocious opponents in the world.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: Kung Fu Jungle
programme.desc: A vicious killer goes around challenging and killing top refined martial arts masters. When convicted killer and kung fu expert Hahou Mo hears of this, he offers to help the police capture the killer in exchange for his freedom. Can he really help?

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killer’s mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened…

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: The Bullet Vanishes
programme.desc: A murder case which the bullet seems to disappear. A detective and his partner start the investigation that revolves around the questions of “Is shooting without bullets possible? How can a bullet disappear upon contact with a body?”

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: A bachelorette weekend spins hilariously out of control when three friends wake up naked on a beach and find themselves handcuffed to a mysterious briefcase, with local gangsters in pursuit. They must regain memories of what happened that weekend if they hope to go back home safely!

programme.title: Incredible Monk, Dragon Return, The
programme.desc: Ko Yan Kit is a famous General in Song dynasty. Due to public pressure, Ko dare not confess his feeling for his first love Fung Yee, who is forced to work in a brothel. Feeling helpless, he asks a monk for help. Everything goes smoothly, but when Fung Yee is suddenly killed, the monk must travel to the underworld to save Ko’s first love!

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Heng is a high school student whose mother abandoned the family eight years ago. You Mei is a teacher whose husband is having an affair. When You Mei becomes a temporary teacher at Heng's school, the two lonely souls develop a forbidden love.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return…

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Two Wrongs Make a Right
programme.desc: When an internationally-renowned Feng Shui Master, Ray, forecasts a predestined doom ahead, he sets out to find an ill-fated wretch to serve as the scapegoat of his mishaps and finds Pei Pei. Little did Ray expect to fall in love with her and must decide whether their relationship is worth the series of unfortunate events that would follow.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Namiya
programme.desc: Namiya is a Chinese adaptation of the novel, Miracles Of The Namiya General Store, by best-selling author, Keigo Higashino. When three runaways shack up in an abandoned general store, a supernatural correspondence connects them to many lives that were all touched by the owner of the store years before they were born.

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student defect a cunning, malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the family business, over the game of mahjong.

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Mari Hirakawa inherits her father’s dojo after his death but wants to sell it as she does not want to run the karate practice. For her plan to succeed, she has to take on a bet with his father’s ex-student and compete in a martial arts competition that will change her life.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiancé Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan…

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professor’s assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family’s objection, so Hong’s maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Trilogy Of Swordsmanship
programme.desc: A kung fu anthology film consisting of three stories: a man embarrasses himself while trying to prove his worth to the father of the woman he loves; a courtesan in love with a general will need to deliver a notorious bandit in exchange for him not being executed; and a group of bandits forms a plan to rescue a new friend from being executed.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent’s consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her…

programme.title: The Emperor And His Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlong’s younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles…

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family’s young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo’s stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies…

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor’s sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: In The Sword And The Lute, Kwei Wu (Jimmy Wang Yu) and his partner (Chin Ping) are on a mission to destroy the "Phoenix Lute", a deadly weapon that shoots poisonous needles up to 500 paces and which can only be destroyed by the Kan curved sword...

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a police’s son, blames his father for his mother’s death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Pursuit Of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Martial Arts Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers’ death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Lady Is The Boss
programme.desc: Wong Hsia Yuan is a traditional kung fu master whose academy is on the brink of closure. Chan Mei Ling arrives from U.S. to revitalize the academy but her way of recruiting students is going beyond questionably legal. Yuan is furious, but when the local triads enter the picture, Yuan and Ling join hands to take back the neighborhood.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Disciples Of The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: Woman Of The Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn’s beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong’s concubine as he knows Dong’s adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan (Yuan Te) to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko (Chen Kuan-tai) she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until she's threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Two Champions Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun…

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers’ claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huang’s father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70’s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister’s magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Flag Of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: Following an accident, a young man gets a major surgery performed on his face. However, when he realises that a lot of people are after his life, he decides to find out why.

programme.title: Irumbu Thirai
programme.desc: A military officer borrows money from a bank using fake papers for his sister's marriage. However, when the money goes missing from his account, he begins an investigation that leads him to a hacker.

programme.title: Velan
programme.desc: A carefree Velan falls in love with his collegemate, Ananya, and plans to marry her. However, a mistake in the decision made by his father, an influential man, puts the couple's romance in jeopardy.

programme.title: En Peyar Surya En Veedu India
programme.desc: Following two violent incidents at a club and a police station, a short tempered soldier is challenged to give up anger if he wants to fulfill his dream of serving at the borders.
Dr.Vaseegaran is forced to reassemble Chitti in order to stop a deadly winged monster.

programme.title: Ivan Thanthiran
programme.desc: Two engineering dropouts stumble upon the activities of a corrupt education minister owning engineering colleges and expose him. The minister wants revenge and launches a manhunt for them. The cat-and-mouse game begins.

programme.title: Dhilukku Dhuddu 2
programme.desc: In a bid to escape from Viji's antics, his neighbours lure him to fall in love with Maya. However, everything turns upside down when he realises that a ghost is protecting Maya.

programme.title: Mohini
programme.desc: Vaishnavi and Sandeep, a couple, are engaged to be married soon. However, things spiral out of control when she get possessed by her dead lookalike, who thirsts for revenge against Sandeep.

programme.title: Seeru
programme.desc: A guy from a small-town takes on a ruthless criminal lawyer for his friend and sister

programme.title: Killadi Marumagan
programme.desc: The son of an egoistic businessman falls in love with an egoistic girl and has to convince her egoistic mother in order to marry her.

programme.title: Kanni Raasi
programme.desc: Gemini, a young man, is averse to love and relationships. However, when Anjali, a teacher, moves in next door, she falls for him and tries to change his mind.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: A TV journalist goes against the orders of his corrupt and dishonest boss and helps a group of youngsters in their fight against a pesticide factory.

programme.title: Danny
programme.desc: After the police inspector Kunthavai picks up a complex murder case for investigation, she takes the help of Danny, a smart police dog, to unearth a gang of dangerous criminals involved in serial killing.

programme.title: Jai Hind 2
programme.desc: One man's fight to give good education to the poor.

programme.title: Thirumanam
programme.desc: Santhosh marries Janani against his will in order to fulfil his parents' wish. However, she believes that they will lead a happy life but soon finds out that her husband loves another woman.

programme.title: Asura Guru
programme.desc: The life of a high-tech robber with exceptional skills of evading the law changes when a private detective tries to get a hold of him.

programme.title: Arasangam
programme.desc: Arivarasu goes to Canada to search for his missing brother-in-law. However, he discovers a plot by terrorists to kill all intellectuals in India and stop the country's growth.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Thirunaal
programme.desc: Blade, a henchman for a local gangster, Naaga, falls in love with Vidhya, the daughter of a factory owner. He has to choose between supporting her father and his boss, who are rivals.

programme.title: Maragatha Naanayam
programme.desc: A young man races to find a legendary treasure which causes him many troubles.

programme.desc: A group of friends go for a yacht ride to celebrate their friend's birthday. However, their party turns into a misadventure when they decide to go swimming and they encounter a dangerous predator.

programme.title: Lekar Hum Deewana Dil

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Based on true stories retold by Palestinian refugees, this animation focuses on 11 year-old Wardi’s life in a Lebanese camp. One day, her beloved great-grandfather entrusts her with his most prized possession – the key to their ancestral house in Galilea.

programme.title: Mom Or Dad?
programme.desc: After years of marriage, Valeria and Nicola decide to amicably divorce. However, when both receive lucrative job offers abroad, each tries to avoid having custody of the kids by fashioning themselves as a bad parent. A hilarious war of tricks ensues.

programme.title: Discovering Mandy
programme.desc: Hot young designer, Mia, is a lowly dressmaker’s daughter who has worked hard to succeed in the cutthroat fashion world. However, her world crashes when her famous mentor abandons her suddenly and she is Mandy again, being forced to return to her roots.

programme.title: Truth And Justice
programme.desc: Young Andres settles in a new farm. With rose-tinted lenses, he sets out to transform the farm into a prosperous paradise – all he needs is a healthy harvest, cooperative neighbours and a male heir. But, life turns out to be cruel and treacherous.

programme.title: Love In The Skies
programme.desc: In this mile-high romantic comedy, Charlotte is an air stewardess who enjoys singlehood and her jet set lifestyle. But her life changes drastically when she falls for a charming passenger whilst simultaneously helping her best friend raise her new-born.

programme.title: The Grump
programme.desc: After a bad fall, a grumpy old farmer is forced to move to the city to live with his meek son and domineering daughter-in-law. He ends up squabbling with her and the house becomes a chaotic hellhole. Yet, with time, the family becomes closer than ever.

programme.title: Detective Durant: Young, Blonde & Dead
programme.desc: When the mutilated bodies of three girls are found, police affirm that a serial killer is on the loose. As part of investigations, Inspector Julia enters the world of the rich and mighty – where the killer might be closer to her than she’d ever imagine.

programme.title: The Winner And I
programme.desc: Carolin is a geriatric nurse and single mother who is stuck with heavy debt. When she finds a 5 million winning lottery ticket, her honest nature prompts her to find its owner. However, things get tricky when the whole town finds out about her “win”.

programme.title: Zurich
programme.desc: Nina roams the highways of Europe in a desperate attempt to forget her past. She decides to join a German driver on his journey, but it becomes clear that Nina’s behaviour stems from her pain due to a past betrayal.

programme.title: Balancing Act
programme.desc: Marie has it all – a loving family and a successful career. However, her world comes crashing when she’s diagnosed with multiple sclerosis. As she struggles to come to terms with the trauma, she learns to accept help from others and find the silver lining.

programme.desc: Detectives Gordon (BEN McKENZIE) and Bullock (DONAL LOGUE) investigate a child trafficking ring preying on Gotham’s street kids, including Selina Kyle (CAMREN BICONDOVA).

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 17
programme.desc: Trouble arises when Amy learns that Sheldon has applied for a one-way mission to colonize Mars.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 9
programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? Then, the legality of a locker's contents is called into question, but Brandon and Lori take a leap of faith and are rattled by what they find. And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 2
programme.desc: The biggest auction you've ever seen explodes when rival bidders bet huge sums of money on forfeited international shipping containers. Will the bidders go home with brand new motor vehicles and large carnival antiques, or will they lose tens of thousands of dollars on duds? Each container is a mystery just waiting to be unveiled.

programme.desc: A popular online "purity test" provides the students of Neptune High School with entertainment until someone makes public everyone's private results, humiliating and embarrassing several students, including Meg (recurring guest star ALONA TAL), a nice girl with whom Veronica sympathizes. Veronica searches for the culprit along with computer geek Mac (recurring guest star TINA MAJORINO - "Napoleon Dynamite"). Meanwhile, Keith helps Wallace and his mom with their unruly tenant. Later, Veronica meets with condemned killer Abel Koontz (CHRISTIAN CLEMENSON) to get answers about Lilly's murder.

programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep185
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: After School Club Ep556
programme.desc: After School Club is the Live Music Request show for K-Pop fans all around the world. On our weekly live show, you can join our video chat sessions through Google Hangouts, send us tweets, and share status. Also, ASC presents the K-POP stars' record storehouse! The ASC Archive will be a compilation of the deep conservations about the guests' albums, the diverse requests they carry out, as well as TMIs from behind-the-scenes.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arriving late at night in bustling downtown Seoul, Alexander kicks off his epic Korean adventure in Gangnam, the fabled district immortalised by Psy's Gangnam Style video - the most viewed song on YouTube.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In early May China enters a new solar term "Start of Summer". In Guizhou, scientists working on the FAST telescope are discovering new pulsars frequently.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Since 1939, more than eight billion Shreddies have been made; watch how it's done. See how a batch of Black Forest cakes take 12,000 cherries to make, and how tzatziki is made by the tanker full.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Watch how lasagne is assembled by both man and machine, and see how one batch of brownies makes 6,500 treats. And you can find out about the secret spice blend for maple caramelized onions.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Shangri La - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep1
programme.desc: On icebreaker ship Polarstern, the team battle cracking ice, hungry polar bears, violent storms and 24-hour darkness, as they struggle to establish their research base deep inside the Arctic Circle.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In early May China enters a new solar term "Start of Summer". In Guizhou, scientists working on the FAST telescope are discovering new pulsars frequently.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep1
programme.desc: See the secrets of the ice cream served like a cake, or the production of tangy tartar sauce, and a machine called the "encruster" that makes a single batch of 2,700 bite-size cake pops.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep2
programme.desc: A look at ready-to-blend fruit smoothies, and turning raw organic cocoa beans into chocolate bars. Plus the production of delicious paneer, and the story behind wasabi.

programme.title: Wild Japan S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hokkaido - The northern island of Hokkaido swings from Siberia-like winters to Mediterranean-like summers. Everything living on Japan's wildest island needs to be extra resilient to survive.

programme.title: The Story of China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Golden Age - In Twin Dragon Alley, in the city of Kaifeng, locals tell Michael him the legend of the baby boys who became emperors. He looks at China's most famous work of art - the Kaifeng scroll.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Arkansas, USA - Ben Fogle reunites with a former medical student living in the woodlands of Arkansas. Ben discovers the impact a series of injuries have had on his physically demanding wild lifestyle.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Extreme Australia, Northern Territory and Queensland - Robson heads to the southern hemisphere to catch some of their summer fish, but this is no jolly - the warmer it is, the tougher the fish get.

programme.desc: A New Perspective - From space, we follow elephants struggling through drought, reveal unknown penguin colonies from the colour of their faeces, and discover strange ice rings that could endanger seals.

programme.desc: The Ming - Michael Wood recounts the tale of one of China's most famous dynasties beginning with the amazing story of Hongwu, a peasant rebel who founded one of greatest eras in Chinese history.

programme.desc: Discover how engineers bent two Manhattan skyscrapers and then connected them with a sky bridge 700 feet in the air, and in Greece the 10,000 square foot canopy designed to withstand hurricane winds on a building engineered to survive earthquakes.

programme.desc: ION Adventure Hotel, Iceland - Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit ION Adventure Hotel in Iceland, a design hotel levitating out from a dormant volcano. Guests visit here expecting the adventure of a lifetime, exploring lava flows and glaciers. Taking guests snorkelling in near-icy water reveals secret and stunning rock chasms between the earth's tectonic plates, and learning how to keep guests safe on an erupting volcano is a trip of a lifetime.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S4) Ep2
programme.desc: Reid's Palace, Madeira - Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit Reid's Palace on Madeira, which first welcomed the world's glamorous elite 130 years ago and is working to keep its silver service traditions alive in the modern world. Giles irons bedspreads in a suite once loved by Winston Churchill, and Monica cleans crabs out of the historic tidal swimming pool.

programme.title: Donal's Super Food in Minutes (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Donal serves up a One Pan chicken Parmesan that really hits the spot, and moreish Pork Drunken Noodles.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Dino-Can-Do / Big Bad Bug - Crackridge's new resident dinosaur has a hard time fitting in. Archibald and a new friend attempt to conquer their fear of the basement.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep7
programme.desc: Eep-Over/Thunkytown - When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever Ep7
programme.desc: Campfire Weekend / Girls Just Wanna Save Fun - When the girls can’t go to camp they create their very own on Harvey street. The story of how Audrey, Dot and Lotta first became the Harvey Girls.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Dino-Can-Do / Big Bad Bug - Crackridge's new resident dinosaur has a hard time fitting in. Archibald and a new friend attempt to conquer their fear of the basement.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep7
programme.desc: The Gray Matter / Fever Break - Oh and Tip discover an underground cult living in the sewers./While Tip is home with a fever, she witnesses a crime committed by her scheming neighbor, Donny.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep7
programme.desc: He Blinded Me With Science - Julien teams up with Timo, the tenrec, a scientist who the King elists to automate everything in the kingdom.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep7
programme.desc: A Wanderer In Paris - Odlulu has a magical shrinking key in France and has set her sights on the Great Race. Wally and Wenda help local racer Jacques after Odlulu shrunk his and everyone else's bikes.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Colossal Strawberry/The Sappening - When Berry sees a "giant strawberry," she's convinced that the prophecy of the berry colossus has com e true and that she's been chosen to lead her people to their true calling. Rocksy, meanwhile, is devastated that her friend is leaving, unti she realizes the strawberry is actually a pinata and Berry is in danger! / Twig is afraid his sapping will put the Mighty Ones in peril, but Rocksy aims to show him that his sap can be used for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Costly Conundrum Of The Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero – but being “brave” quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep7
programme.desc: The Dark Side Of The Moose: Chapter Two - Rocky and Bullwinkle encounter a young alien and set out on a mission to reunite him with his alien family but things get complicated when they accidentally lose him at an alien convention and Boris, Natasha and other eccentric billionaire Colonel Boudreaux are also after him

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep7
programme.desc: Reign Of Fireworms - Fireworms invade Dragon's Edge, while Ruffnut and Tuffnut discover that they have an unexpected connection to the island.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep7
programme.desc: Tears Of Balmera - Hunk and Coran search for a new power crystal on a living planet inhabited by an alien race imprisoned by Zarkon. Back at the Castle, Pidge sabotages Sendak's efforts to steal Voltron.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep33
programme.desc: The Case Of The Messed-Up Painting - Queen Sparklewings has done a beautiful painting to use in her Story-Time afternoon. But then Coco and Noddy discover it ruined! Coco thinks that Bling must have done it but she protests her innocence. Noddy investigates: who messed up the Queen's painting - and can he get it fixed again in time? Keep investigating, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep34
programme.desc: The Case Of The Deltoid'S Challenge - "Deltoid accepts the Ninja's challenge to run around the loop-theloop. But when he fails on his first attempt, he feels ready to give up in despair. Noddy investigates: How can he help Deltoid do his challenge?"

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep35
programme.desc: The Case Of The Knights On Patrol - The Knights set off on their patrol but are delayed by someone playing tricks on them. Noddy investigates: who's playing tricks on the Knights? He soon finds them in Fable Forest, waylaid by yet another cheeky trick. Noddy will have to find the culprit before the Knights end up in serious trouble!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep36
programme.desc: The Case Of The Delayed Repairs - The railway tracks are being repaired all over Toyland by the Builders, so Farmer Tom, Tractor and a trailer are running a replacement service. But the repairs take longer than expected when the Builders' tools go missing. Noddy investigates, and finds that Cloppycorn loved the trailer rides so much that he hid the biolders' tools in a basket that Pat-Pat had asked him to take to the other Naughticorns. Cloppycorn apologies, the tracks are swiftly repaired, and Cloppycorn happily rides around the farm on the trailer. Well done Noddy !

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep33
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Hiccups - Raa Raa can't get rid of his hiccups. Can his friends help him?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep34
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo'S Wriggly Jiggly Game - Topsy is having a party and Raa Raa is helping organise the games. But not everybody is good at them. Can Raa Raa and his friends come up with new games that all the friends are good at and enjoy?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep35
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Perfect Present - Raa Raa is sure he has found the perfect present for each of his friends… but what happens if the packages get mixed up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep36
programme.desc: Raa Raa The Copycat - Raa Raa is playing a game - copying everyone in the jungle. He soon distracts his friends… but can he put the game to good use?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep33
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor'S Birthday Suit - Mr Carburettor is off to try out his new wetsuit at the beach… it may come in useful when rain is forecast for the big race the next day!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep34
programme.desc: Big Bangs - Mr Carburettor is planning a big firework display up at the farm. Can Roary help Tin Top overcome his fear of bangs in time for the display?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep35
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Pizza - Mr Carburettor has demanded pizza for lunch but the pizzeria is closed. How is Marsha going to ensure Mr Carburettor gets the lunch he asked for?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep36
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Stars - Roary is feeling put out as all the cars are paying Conrod too much attention. He is determined to show his worth when they race that afternoon. But tries too hard and ends up in danger. Who can save him?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep17
programme.desc: Curse Of The Sarcophagus / Whiz Kid Ra - Curse of the Sarcophagus Ra throws out the instruction manual for his new high-tech Sarcophagus without reading it first. Whiz Kid Ra When Ra secretly uses the all-knowing Answertorium to ace a test, he earns a reputation for having all the answers.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep18
programme.desc: Dimension Demented / Taming Of The Gloutch - Dimension Demented When Ra tries to bring a jukebox to school by stuffing it into the Dimension Tube, he ends up sending himself on a terrifying inter-dimensional journey. The Taming of The Gloutch Gloutch raising—a test all Scare School students must take—involves raising a cute, adorable creature into a terrifying monster.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Stuck In Skates / Lawn Circles - After ice skating with his pen pal, Archibald can't remove his too-tight skates. Crackridge has crop circles. Could aliens really be responsible?

programme.desc: Into The Belly Of The Den Of The House Of The Nest Of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep8
programme.desc: Crushing It - As a Rumblehorn wreaks havoc on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup seeks the help of Stoick – who forms an unexpected bond with the rampaging beast.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep8
programme.desc: Tortools - The Dinotrux find a nest of Tortool eggs. The hatchlings think Dozer is their mother and proceed to wreak havoc, painting everything in sight.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Bad Egg - Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bouncing Bulb - Pat's Special Delivery is a very large, very fragile lighthouse bulb, and everything seems to be conspiring to make him break it! Falling timber, an out of control sofa, Bonnie the dog, high winds...! Pat's journey from the sorting office to Pencaster Bay is a minefield of hazards. Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. Out at sea are Alf and PC Selby, enjoying a day's fishing, until they drift off-course and need the lighthouse to guide them ashore...

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Olivia Ep15
programme.desc: Olivia Measures Up - After Olivia teases Ian for being too short for a ride, Father mentions that someday Ian may be the taller sibling. Olivia employs a variety of comical methods to stop Ian from growing. She eventually comes to terms with her own height – with the help of a great pair of shoes!

programme.title: Olivia Ep16
programme.desc: Olivia And The Old West - The class bullfrog is lose, and Mrs. Hogenmuller leaves Olivia in charge as she goes to track it down. Olivia imagines herself as the sheriff of a Wild West town, keeping order and defending against a stampede of giant bullfrogs. But can shedo it alone, or will she need a little help – from Francine?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep15
programme.desc: Funny Business - Big Chris receives a mysterious parcel… the cars are intrigued to find out what is in it. Strange and silly things start happening at the workshop, could it have anything to do with Big Chris' package?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep37
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pocket'S Present - Fuse asks Noddy to take a present to the Pockets. But when Noddy arrives at the Treehouse, he discovers he's carrying an empty box. The present, whatever it was, has gone! Noddy must investigate: where is the Pockets' present? But how will he ever find it when he doesn't actually know what it is? It's going to take all his detecting skills to solve this one!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep38
programme.desc: The Case Of Fuse'S New Game - When Fuse invites his friends to come for a playdate all they want to do is play his new computer game. But then suddenly the computer goes off. He soon discovers there's a power cut affecting the whole of Brickabuild. But who switched off the power? And why? Desperate to carry on with the game, Noddy decides to investigate: how can they play Fuse's new game?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep39
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pirate'S Treasure (Ex : The Case Of The Queen'S Dance) - Queen Sparklewings asks the Pirate Captain to do the first dance with her at the Queen's Dance. But when it's time to practise, the Captain can't come: someone's stolen their treasure! Noddy decides to help find the treasure so the Captain will still be able to dance. He needs to investigate: Who stole the Pirates' treasure?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep40
programme.desc: The Case Of The Empty Store - Clockwork Mouse leaves Carlton in charge of getting everything ready for the Builders' Parade. Carlton gratefully accepts Noddy's offer of help but doesn't want the Naughticorns helping too! But when Carlton goes to the Brickabuild Store for supplies, he's horrified to discover the store is empty. How will they get the parade ready now? And will Clockwork Mouse ever trust Carlton again? Noddy sets out to investigate: Who took all the stuff from the Brickabuild Store?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep37
programme.desc: The Monkey That Roared - Something strange is going on in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Every time Raa Raa visits a friend there is a loud roar… and it wasn't him! Who could it be? Raa Raa sets off to find out

programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep804
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Cheetah - When the Cheetah swipes the Paw Patroller to fulfill her nefarious plan to destroy the jungle and build the cheating-est racetrack ever, the Paw Patrol must get a brand vehicle and stop her!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save a Soapbox Derby - Adventure Bay is holding a ''kids only'' soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game / The Fin-ale - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV. // When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Lady Monkey mech / Critter care calamity - Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade so Lady Fluffpot can shop in peace. Can Deer Squad save the parade? // Pollen from Bobbi's snuffleblooms makes everyone start getting super sneezes. Lola activates her Critter Care Centre to help everyone!

programme.desc: Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work - Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Paddington And The Summer Games - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Magenta's Case of the Giggles - Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one 'patient' seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep605
programme.desc: Race to Sky High Mountain - At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - At the opening of the Larimar Time Capsule, Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Lost Girl in a Canoe - The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Whale of a Tale / The Pirate Painter - When whales start to pile up in Caracole Cove, Santi and crew must stop the noisy undersea disruption to their usual migration pattern. // When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise - Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler - Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep157
programme.desc: The Magic Trick - Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! Christopher is transformed into a balloon and the balloon into Froga!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep158
programme.desc: Go Find it ! - Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep805
programme.desc: Pups Save The Mustache / Pups Save the Funhouse - The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The supersized sunflower / Moontaker - Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? // Lady Fluffpot wants a statue made of moon rock, but the deer know that messing with the moon is a bad idea!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News - The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Paddington Goes Camping - Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Lifguard Blaze! - Today, Blaze and AJ are on a mission to become Lifeguards. But it'll take four daring rescues to achieve their official Lifeguard badge and only the bravest monster trucks have what it takes.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Hiccup Soup - When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect several ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - At the opening of the Larimar Time Capsule, Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure - Santiago and his family team up to save the Fruit Festival when Enrique crashes the party and steals all the fruit! // The crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure, but when the boys fall asleep it's up to the girls to save the day!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep611
programme.desc: A Big Splash! - On the Shimmy-Shimmy Islands, everyone's preparing for Queen Zooli's Dance Party! But each time they practice their songs for the party, they're splashed by a huge wave! Will they find who's causing the waves before the party is cancelled?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep612
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Laughs-a-Lot! - Jesters Goby and Gil arrive in the Kingdom of NeverLaugh, where King Grumpfish declares that he'll outlaw laughter forever if no one can make him laugh before sundown! Will the Jesters be able to crack him up before it's too late?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Fun Fair - The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep151
programme.desc: The Amazing Guesser - After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! Christopher utilizes the help of Bubu and Ron to surprise the surprisers when they wake up!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep152
programme.desc: The Robot Player - Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep220
programme.desc: The Wishing Wheel - Blaze, AJ, and Stripes are searching for the Wishing Wheel: a magical treasure that will grant a wish for one lucky race car. With chomping, stomping, and slithering dangers at each turn, can Blaze and his friends stay on track?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bears / Pups Save a Farmerless Farm - Bears are asleep all over town! The PAW Patrol must work quietly to save the bears and return them to their cave. // With the farmers out of town, Mayor Goodway calls the PAW Patrol to wrangle the animals and control the chaos on the farmerless farm

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Pups Save a White Wolf / Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer - After a sudden snow storm, Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them. // Famous wrong-way explorer, Travelling Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole where they run into some crocodiles?

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Switcheroo / Protect The Egg - Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Treasure Park - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington The Table Tennis Champ! - It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation? // Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.desc: Sparkle's Racing Badge - It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.
